column4: Are there many Negroes that use Ubuntu, despite its diverse name?
I love to use Ubuntu, but I am afraid that it is too hard to use for most nignogs
Since their bell curve is centered on an IQ of 80
referring to the typical black person
what does the color of a persons skin, their sex or anything else have to do with if they can use ubuntu?
there is much more to race than the color of skin
for example propensity for sickle cell
so you are saying people of African descent are stupid?
hence most negroes are too dense in mass to swim
but is there any kind of demographic study for Ubuntu usage?
not to dispute your 'findings' but pretty well all of the colored people I know are smarter then the average white person I know
